backend/main.mo: Actor with access control, user profiles, credit and game logic, withdrawal handling, and Stripe config state.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that maps old Stripe configuration field to new stripeConfig field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and UI details of numerous frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based dark theme styles with OKLCH variables and animations.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML template loading the main React entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Router setup for all pages including admin-guarded routes, theme provider, and profile setup logic.
frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentSet: Empty placeholder file for admin Stripe configuration UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Component that checks admin status and redirects unauthorized users to the unauthorized page.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal that forces new users to create a profile by submitting minimal data.
frontend/src/components/game/SpinWheel.t: Animated spin wheel component that rotates to a target angle based on game outcome and triggers a win celebration.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with navigation, mobile menu, admin link handling, and logout integration using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/wallet/BalanceTi: Smoothly animates displayed balance toward the latest value over timed incremental steps.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, logout, identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile, spinning the wheel, admin checks, leaderboard, and house edge values.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup plus custom theme variables, animations, and utility classes for UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard providing navigation to user management, wheel config, and withdrawals.
Lists all users ranked by credits using leaderboard data with loading state handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWheelConfi: Allows admins to view and update house edge settings and displays fixed probability segments.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWithdrawal: Placeholder page for managing withdrawal requests, noting the feature is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/pages/BuyCreditsPage.tsx: Displays purchasable credit packages and triggers Razorpay loading for payments, with UI feedback and package selection handling.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Shows user balance and a spin wheel game that costs credits, handling spin results and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides a branded login screen using Internet Identity authentication with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentFailu: Shows a cancelled payment message with actions to retry or return to the game.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentSucce: Confirms successful payment, refreshes profile data, and links to wallet or game.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays user profile details including principal ID, balance, transactions count, and identity verification status.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionsPage.tsx: Shows a full, reversed transaction history with icons and labels for deposits, withdrawals, and spins.
frontend/src/pages/UnauthorizedPage.tsx: Renders an access denied message with an option to return to the main game.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Displays the user's wallet with balance, recent transactions, and navigation to buy credits or withdraw.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawPage.tsx: Shows withdrawal info and a notice that withdrawal functionality is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Utility functions for formatting INR and converting between rupees and paise.
frontend/src/utils/razorpay.ts: Defines Razorpay types and a loader for the Razorpay checkout script.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines project state, architectural notes, known issues, required images, and existing feature metadata for build planning.
